Posts.Content: How would he live on his own? What you write is disturbing- if he won’t chip in with cleaning or cooking how will he help you if you’re sicker? You could need help with these things and family is first choice for caregiver. Maybe he doesn’t understand situation has changed; maybe he can hire a housecleaner and cook? Good luck!
Posts.Title: What’s on your cancer care package wish list?

Posts.Content: Why not the litter box? If you’ve had the cat a while aren’t you already exposed and acclimated to any possible toxoplasmosis?
Posts.Title: What’s on your cancer care package wish list?

Posts.Content: Thanks, although when you read it through if you change it daily (feces) isn’t a problem etc - can work around risk and for a non roaming house cat almost no chance has it - well worth reading but even says can take care of your cat just some precautions can take
